name: Demon Slayer Copyright crowdfunding - ROLE
description:
ROLE aims to be an IP co-creation and co-operation Web3 platform, where IP creators and IP enthusiasts can have a more accessible and transparent means to communicate with each other and push forward more outstanding community-favored IP works.
Demon Slayer will be our first crowdfunding project! Once we reach our target, we will buy the copyright of Demon Slayer and initiate the adaptation in a co-creation mode. Wanna display your talents and imagination on the thrilling adventure? You will also have a chance to receive exclusive NFT airdrops in the future. Come join us!
payDisclosure:
If we don't meet the crowdfunding target, you will get a full refund.
Once our $ROLE token gets listed on DEX in the future, you will be able to exchange the tokens obtained by participating in the crowdfunding at a ratio of 1 to 1.
